features: Have a full size applicator in a slim design for outstanding period protection
Full size tampons with a smooth applicator tip for quick, easy insertion and PerfectTouch Grip for just-right placement
Unscented tampons (free of artificial scents and fragrances)
Individually wrapped tampons in three colorful designs to help you escape boring period protection
Packaging may vary from image shown
body.description: U By Kotex Sleek Tampons have a full size applicator with no-slip grip for easy insertion and just right placement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Great for heavy flow! Love these! I would totally buy again. You can wear them for 4+ hours and never leak!!! The packaging is cute, classy , but discreet! Applicator is nice and sleek and the box that it came it was perfect! Nice and not so girly and great for period use! Totally recommend these for the low price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 6, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Please don't stop making/selling these. They're getting harder to find. The rubber gripper is genius.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I love these tampons, but ever since the recall I can no longer find these specific kind at Walgreens and Walmart

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I would not if she didn't love them. She always request that if I get ...
reviews.reviewText: I buy this product for my daughter-in-law; I would not if she didn't love them. She always request that if I get her any personal hygiene product is to get U by Kotex products! Excellent product as far as she is concern.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best of the bestest
reviews.reviewText: The best. Can never find these in the store and I love them so much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 27, 2017
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST tampons out there
reviews.reviewText: BEST tampons out there. Serious. I'd been using another brand for 15+ years and just switched because I loved these so much. The price on amazon is unbeatable, too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 17, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect design and function!
reviews.reviewText: Finally there is a product that doesn't come open in my purse, is compact, and gives me peace of mind because it works and fits the way it should/

Female Hygiene products have come a long way in last few years. My wife has never looked back to sanitary napkins since she started using tampons few years ago. She has used Kotex as well as Tempax and while both have some great products, she is liking some of the new products from Kotex even more.U By Kotex Tampons Sleek Super Absorbency Tampons are one of the best protection plastic applicator tampons for heavy days with amazing comfort and convenience. Typically, she needs Super Absorbency only 1-2 days in the cycle and she find these one very convenient and comfortable. She is home-maker which means she has to pretty much work whole day for chasing after kids and to maintain home and she likes comfort of these ones. Tampon opens all around, conforming to body. The absorbent core locks away any fluid. I have no complains in terms of absorbency or comfort is concerned.This particular package comes with Super absorbency tampons and they are unscented. It comes in individually wrapped 18 packages which are easy to store in purse and easy to carry. The packaging is special as it is quieter and resalable.IMPORTANT NOTE:Tampons come in different absorbency levels depending on menstrual flow such as Light, Regular, Super, Super Plus and Ultra. Many people think that selecting the best absorbency level is better, but this is not wise. Tampons carry rare risk of getting Toxic Shock Syndrome (TSS) and hence manufacturers recommend choosing minimum required absorbency level to control menstrual flow to reduce the risk of getting TSS.

reviews.reviewTitle: Comfortable, reliable and offers peace of mind with Super Absorbency
reviews.reviewText: I don't care about what color these are, I just care about comfort and reliability. These are comfortable and totally painless to insert and I forget about it once it has disappeared ;) For Super absorbency tampons, I can easily go a full 4 - 8 hours without leaks but I have a light to medium heavy flow at the peak of my cycle. I like the option of using higher absorbency tampons overnight so I don't have issues and on days where I know I can't change them out as often as I would have to with light or regular absorbency types.

This 18-count package of tampons from "U' by Kotex (U By Kotex Tampons Sleek Super Absorbency) is a great buy. They are great for almost any day of the menstrual cycle. The applicator is easy to use, likely in part due to the fact that it is indeed a 'full-size' applicator. These are, simply put, great tampons that get the job done!

I have come to really enjoy this brand it's a great to have a good plastic applicator it seems to go in smoother and is easier for cleanup. These are durable and easy to carry around with you. The pack is small but it's a good one to give this brand a try if you're not sure what you need absorbance wise or if you will like this version. I would say it's on par with other top brand names out there. Basically the same product.
